name: The Verge Dark (2016)
description:
Darkens the Verge. Hides social media share buttons. Removes non-article stuff. Turns headings orange.
Best used with "Clean the Verge" and "Clean the Verge More".
additional_info:
24-02-2016: More tweaks. removed padding of hidden elements.
13-1-2016: Removed lots of useless stuff at the bottom. more headings are orange. fixed some issues.

Author names are still black on main page.
